subject: Swimming
Olympic Games (2012)
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: Michael Phelps won a silver in the men’s 200-meter butterfly, then took a gold as the anchor of the United States’ winning 4x200-meter freestyle relay.
snippet: Michael Phelps won a silver in the men’s 200-meter butterfly, then took a gold as the anchor of the United States’ winning 4x200-meter freestyle relay.
